member.name: AUTHNEXTSTEP
member.summary: Specifies the next action that the WebDAV client should take after a successful call to the DavAuthCallback callback function.

member.name: AUTHNEXTSTEP.DefaultBehavior
member.summary: Retry the connection request without using the DavAuthCallback callback function. This is the same as the default behavior if no callback function is registered.

member.name: AUTHNEXTSTEP.RetryRequest
member.summary: Retry the connection request using the credentials that were retrieved by the DavAuthCallback function.
